text: Ryosuke Kijima (born 29 May 1979) is a Japanese former football player. He plays for Roasso Kumamoto. His younger brother Tetsuya is also a footballer. ==Club statistics== .Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "2017 J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑 (NSK MOOK)", 8 February 2017, Japan, (p. 228 out of 289)Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "2016J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑", 10 February 2016, Japan, (p. 220 out of 289) Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup Total Total 1998 Yokohama Marinos J1 League 2 0 0 0 0 0 2 0 1999 Yokohama F.
